name: Circuitous (itch) (Modernllama)
description:
Circuitous challenges you to take an indirect approach to completing puzzles. Control snake like beings and collect coins in the level whilst avoiding mines and yourself. You can't backtrack on yourself so you become more of an obstacle as you complete the level.

With a chilled relaxed soundtrack and relaxing visuals, Circuitous should be a relaxing experience that anyone can play.
